items.title: Why LootMogul Marketplace?
items.description: We are a prolific sports web3 gaming and e-commerce space working with a community of athletes to build an online platform that allows ownership of unique digital assets. We create a significant niche of digital collectibles that come with real-life utilities. Members can buy, sell, and trade them. Brands can promote their sports-specific products in the marketplace.

items.title: LootMogul Marketplace- Benefits
items.description: A functional marketplace offers brands multiple ways of making an income. Collectibles find their gateway and are sold at display museums; sports fanatics can get access to stadium games, buy digital tokens, businesses can make promotions, and buy & sell limited-edition merchandise. Meta stadiums provide several monetization opportunities ensuring transparent transactions.

items.title: Create, Sell, Collect & Share
items.description: Curate, collect, and trade exclusive digital collectibles on the marketplace. Unique graphic trading cards, digital tokens, sports athletesâ€™ collectibles, and other unique digital assets are created and sold via the DeFi model. Secure payment options are a bonus for the members to buy and sell through a reliable mode of payment, along with ten underlying cryptocurrencies.

items.title: Wide Range of Collection
items.description: Explore our collectibles page and purchase from a wide range of Sporticon, Platina, Meta Avatars, Trading Cards, and others from our splendid selection of digital collectibles. If you are a sports enthusiast, this section is for you. All our collectibles come with In Real Life or In Game Play utilities.
